author: pier
msg: Reverse the order of assignability check

author: pier
msg: Avoid illegal access and null pointer exceptions

author: pier
msg: When we instantiate a component, it is better if we pass it back to the requestor

author: pier
msg: Make sure exceptions target-exceptions are re-thrown and not wrapped

author: trustin
msg: * Fixed: UDPListenerManager listens to DisconnectEvent which is not fired by UDP-related managers.
* Added: EventTypeFilter which replaces Subscription.type property
=> This changes the method signature of EventRouter.subscribe/unsubscribe; event type params are gone.
* Added: ClientKeyTypeFilter which prevents TCP-related managers from receiving UDP-related events and vice versa.
* Added: CompositeEventFilter to combine EventTypeFilter and ClientKeyTypeFilter
